content:
How does "Good Street Radar" know my house's layout?
...Hmm, my curiosity is piqued.
Perhaps I should send them an inquiry via PuffPost?
info: 幻雪关于好街雷达闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I received a rating reward from "Good Street Radar,"
They mentioned in their PuffPost,
That they're looking forward to seeing my matching furniture sets.
info: 幻雪关于好街雷达闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I've heard that the "Good Street Radar" ratings
are created by "the Company,"
but it's quite mysterious - no one has been able to determine their evaluation criteria.
info: 幻雪关于好街雷达闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
But... lately I've been quite fond of mixing and matching styles.
Hmm, let me experiment and see...
Perhaps I can create a "coordinated set" this way.
info: 幻雪关于好街雷达闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
This question... it makes me absolutely curious!
While receiving gifts makes me happy,
And compliments are delightful too, but still!
